results.name: Palindromes > 0 with an even number of prime factors (counted with multiplicity).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..17500 (* 10000 terms from John Cerkan *)
mathematica: Select[Range[1500],PalindromeQ[#]&&EvenQ[PrimeOmega[#]]&] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 01 2020 *)
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1998
